rows.label: qev097802_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, you're back! Did you find a piece of the Lifehold
that contained the information I was after?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Wow, this really does look like medical data.
Nice going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0003
rows.name:
This should at least point us to the cause of her
condition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0004
rows.name:
If it also lists a treatment, so much the betterâ€”
but even just knowing the cause may help us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0005
rows.name: It looks like we'll actually be able to help her get better![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0006
rows.name: I just wish that were the end of things...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0007
rows.name:
But, um...it seems the sick Nopon's lover took off in
search of a cure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0008
rows.name:
All he could really do is bank on discovering something
during his travels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0009
rows.name:
Guess he didn't expect you to show up with a cure for
their incurable disease...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0010
rows.name:
Anyway, he must still be out there somewhere,
wandering across Mira in vain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0011
rows.name: Kind of tragic, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0012
rows.name:
I wish we could let him know that there's hope for his
girlfriend to get better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0013
rows.name:
Plus, I'm sure she'd get better quicker with him around
to give her support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0014
rows.name:
This is a lot to ask as a tack-on to my previous huge
and vague request, but, um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0015
rows.name:
Could you maybe track down that wandering Nopon
and tell him to hurry home?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0016
rows.name: It's for her health, and for love! ...So please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0017
rows.name: Any leads on finding her man?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0018
rows.name:
I know it's not easy to track down someone who's
constantly wandering around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0019
rows.name:
Still, I assume he's stopped at other Nopon caravans
he's passed, so the folks there may know something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097802_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'll bet if you did a lap of the caravans and talked to
everyone, someone would have an answer for you.[ST:wait ]
